template.name: Antivirus Report_by Client (csv)
template.template_md:
** Note This requires a custom field "Antivirus" and "Antivirus - Verify Status" ran with -customfield param **
Device Name, User, Device OS, Antivirus
{% for item in data_sources.agentsList %}{{item.hostname if item.hostname else 'N/A'}},{{item.last_logged_in_user if item.last_logged_in_user else 'N/A'}},{{item.operating_system|replace(",", "") if item.operating_system else 'N/A'}},{{item.custom_fields.Antivirus if item.custom_fields.Antivirus else 'N/A'}},
{% endfor %}
template.template_variables:
data_sources:
  agentsList:
    filter:
      site__client_id: "{{client.id}}"
    custom_fields:
      - Antivirus
    model: agent
    only:
      - hostname
      - operating_system
      - site__name
      - last_logged_in_user
